title: The importance of interoperability in European green corridors

author: Harilaos N. Psaraftis, Laboratory for Maritime Transport, National Technical University of Athens

segmentation: Hello everybody, I'm going to talk about the importance of interoperability in European green corridors and this is in the context of a project that we're running with the European Commission.

This is definition by the European Commission.

Reduce environmental impact.
